articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Apple shuts NYC stores as COVID-19 cases surge - Reuters.com
articles.description: Apple on Monday announced it had closed all of its New York City stores to indoor shopping as cases of the Omicron coronavirus variant surged across the United States. Eve Johnson reports.
articles.content:
Posted 
Apple on Monday announced it had closed all of its New York City stores to indoor shopping as cases of the Omicron coronavirus variant surged across the United States. Eve Johnson reports.
